Title: Establishes a comprehensive training program for care managers employed by care coordination organizations
Summary: Establishes a comprehensive training program for care managers employed by care coordination organizations; mandates care managers complete the training before working with clients.
LawCode: Amd ยง13.23, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing a comprehensive training program for care managers employed by care coordination organizations
